vso_account.label: Visual Studio Team Services account name
vso_account.helpText: Enter your Visual Studio Team Services subdomain (part before visualstudio.com). Learn more by visiting http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=396756

vso_tag.label: Visual Studio Team Services work item tag
vso_tag.helpText: Enter the tag you want to add to each Visual Studio Team Services linked work item. If empty, no tag will be added.

vso_wi_description_template.label: Visual Studio Team Services work item description template
vso_wi_description_template.helpText: Enter the text you want to allow to be used as a work item description template while creating new work items. If empty, no content will be suggested.

admin.title: Administration
admin.settingsSaved: Your Visual Studio Team Services settings have been saved.

login.title: Login
login.help: Provide your Team Services credentials. To use a Personal Access Token (recommended), leave the Username field blank and supply your token in the Password field. The token needs at least the "Work Item (read and write)" scope.

workItems.showDetails: Show more details about this work item
workItems.noWorkItem: There are no work items related to this ticket.
workItems.title: Linked work items ({{count}})

queryResults.noWorkItem: No work items returned by query.

unlink.title: Unlink work item
unlink.text: Are you sure you want to unlink {{name}} from this ticket?
unlink.errUnlink: Could not unlink ticket in Visual Studio Team Services. Please try again.

link.title: Link to a work item
link.help: Please enter the the work item id you'd like to link this ticket with. If you don't know the number of the work item to link, click in button 'Search' to help you find out the work item.
link.errWorkItemIdNaN: The work item id must be a number.
link.errCannotGetWorkItem: Something went wrong while checking work item. Please try again.
link.errCannotUpdateWorkItem: Something went wrong while updating work item. Please try again.
link.errAlreadyLinked: This ticket is already linked that work item.

new.title: New Visual Studio Team Services Work Item
new.help: Fill this form to create a new Visual Studio Team Services work item and link it to this ticket.
new.errWorkItemTypeRequired: The work item type is required

notify.title: Notify linked work items
notify.placeholder: Type in some text to add to the notification

notify.message: -- This notification was sent from Zendesk to all linked Visual Studio Team Services work items by {{name}}. --
notify.vso: Notification from Visual Studio Team Services work item {{workItemKey}}
notify.notification: The linked Visual Studio Team Services work items have been notified
notify.workItemCreated: Work item created in Visual Studio Team Services with id: %@
notify.workItemLinked: Ticket linked with Visual Studio Team Services work item with id: %@
notify.workItemUnlinked: Ticket unlinked of Visual Studio Team Services work item with id: %@

finishSetup: You didn't finish your app configuration: your Visual Studio Team Services account is empty.
errorAjax: There was an error contacting with the server. Please try again
errorLoadingApp: Something went wrong while loading the app. Confirm that your Visual Studio Team Services alternate credentials are correct by clicking in the user icon.
errorInvalidAccount: The Visual Studio Team Services account '{{accountName}}' doesn't exist or you don't have access to it. Contact your Zendesk account Administrator to check and review the app settings.
errorLoadingWorkItems: Something went wrong while loading working items. Click the refresh icon to try again.
errorReadingFieldSettings: There was an error while reading field settings. Applying default settings.
